title: DynaGraph: Interpretable Multi-Label Prediction from EHRs via Dynamic Graph Learning and Contrastive Augmentation
details: M Mesinovic, S Molaei, P Watkinson, T Zhu - arXiv preprint arXiv:2503.22257, 2025
abstract: Learning from longitudinal electronic health records is limited if it does not capture the temporal trajectories of the patient's state in a clinical setting. Graph models allow us to capture the hidden dependencies of the multivariate time-series when the …
